python2.init.script:
function(rcloud.session) { retina <- ''; if (rcloud.session$device.pixel.ratio > 1) { retina <- "config InlineBackend.figure_format = 'retina'" }; inline_plots <- '%matplotlib inline';  paste0(retina, '
', inline_plots) }

function(rcloud.session) { retina <- ''; if (rcloud.session$device.pixel.ratio > 1) { retina <- "config InlineBackend.figure_format = 'retina'" }; inline_plots <- '%matplotlib inline';  paste0(retina, '
', inline_plots) }
